(d) Based on your answer to part (c), if the nominal interest rate is the same for both nations in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, which nation experiences the higher real interest rate in Year <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>? Explain.

(e) Oceanville produces consumer goods and capital goods. While maintaining full employment, Oceanville decides to allocate more resources to the production of consumer goods. What will be the effect on the long-run economic growth rate in Oceanville? Explain.
